I understand a lot of people feel threatened by teenagers because we’re trying to encourage common sense gun safety laws, but please know- we are not here to harm you. We are here because we’ve seen this pattern before and we know that ignoring guns is not the solution.

“That man has a sniper rifle and he’s shooting at us! Please god, help us!”
“Um, actually no sniper would use that rifle?”
“Please! It’s a gun! Send help!”
“Okay, hah, but it’s just a regular rifle so maybe get your facts straight before you try to limit someone else’s freedom?”
